info.title: zoo
info.description: ### An asynchronous zoo API, powered by FastAPI, SQLAlchemy 2.0, Pydantic v2, and Alembic [](https://juftin.com)

get.description: Check the health of the application

post.description: Create a new animal in the database

get.description: Get an animal from the database

delete.description: Delete an animal from the database

patch.description: Update an animal in the database

post.description: Create a new exhibit in the database
Create a new staff in the database

get.description: Get a staff from the database

delete.description: Delete a staff in the database

patch.description: Update a staff in the database

LOGIN_BAD_CREDENTIALS.summary: Bad credentials or the user is inactive.
Bad credentials or the user is inactive.

REGISTER_USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.summary: A user with this email already exists.
